title: Cannot make or join a lobby?
body:
For whatever reason every time I make a game, it says "an error has occurred while making a lobby". Then when I try to join my friend it says "Please wait."
I updated my client yesterday, and i have restarted it to see if that would fix it, but it doesn't.

replies.body:
It sounds like your PC is having a lot of issues establishing a good connection to our matchmaking servers. These sorts of problems are historically caused by certain network configurations that League has issues with, so I suggest working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't happening to you.

Let me know if this fixed it!
